RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 1 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 62. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE NOVEMBER 5, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WILLYMAR lagged back to the turn, circled the field widest, cleared off. SOME WOULD SAY quick to the front, stayed on gamely to the wire best of rest. CHRISTMAS MAGIC inside chase to deep stretch, came out a bit late, weakened. HERO OF THE BEST well placed to the turn, off rail run to the turn, kept on evenly. HIGH MEADOWS never factored throughout. THE RIDER OF #2 HERO OF THE BEST LODGED A CLAIM OF FOUL AGAINST #1 CHRISTMAS MAGIC IN THE STRETCH RUN., THE CLAIM OF FOUL WAS DISALLOWED BY THE STEWARDS AFTER REVIEWING THE VIDIO REPLAY.

ENTRY.NAME: Christmas Magic
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside chase to deep stretch, came out a bit late, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Hero of the Best
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed to the turn, off rail run to the turn, kept on evenly

ENTRY.NAME: High Meadows
ENTRY.COMMENT: never factored throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Some Would Say
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick to the front, stayed on gamely to the wire best of rest

ENTRY.NAME: Willymar
ENTRY.COMMENT: lagged back to the turn, circled the field widest, cleared off

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 84. Starter Allowance Purse 14400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since April 5, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Rac e Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SEAWARD tracked leadsers to far turn, roused to go, responded well to clear under stout handling to the wire. HOT DAME raced rank around first turn, hounded leader to far turn and kept on late for the place spot. PELLETIER raced well back to the half with a wide run through the stretch run for show spot. ANCIENT BROWN inside speed to the front stayed to far turn, gave in readily. PRESCIENCE never threatened throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Hot Dame
ENTRY.COMMENT: rank around first turn, hounded leader to far turn, kept on late

ENTRY.NAME: Ancient Brown
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed to the front stayed to far turn, gave in readily

ENTRY.NAME: Seaward
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leadsers to far turn, roused to go, responded to clear

ENTRY.NAME: Prescience
ENTRY.OWNER: Manning Simon and White Charles H
ENTRY.COMMENT: never threatened throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Pelletier
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced well back to the half with a wide run for show spot

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 79. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE NOVEMBER 5, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since April 5, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Regist ered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FORGLO reserved never far back, rallied outside into the far turn, kept on in the final furng and went clear handily to the wire. EIDA'S STORM speed to the front essured to far turn, kept while no match. C V THUNDER raced along evenly throughout while garnering the show spot. PI YO PRINCESS pressured lead to the half, nothing left and dropped back readily.

ENTRY.NAME: Pi Yo Princess
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressured lead to the half, nothing left and dropped back readily

ENTRY.NAME: Eida's Storm
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to the front pressured to far turn, kept while no match

ENTRY.NAME: Forglo
ENTRY.OWNER: My Wife's Gonna Love This LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved never far back, rallied outside far turn handily clear

ENTRY.NAME: C V Thunder
ENTRY.OWNER: Megson Berva and Hooves and Saddles LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly throughout while garnering the show spot

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 92. Allowance Purse 19000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since April 5 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. (Any Maiden Races, And Only Claiming Races And Only Starter R aces For $20,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LOFTY ADJUDICATOR well handled on the front end between horses early on, cleared off late under stout handling. COYOTE ROAD pressed winner to the stretch, could not get past, bested rest. OUT WORK'N lunged from the gate, raced along evenly while no menace. ONE LAST HAND through early while dropping far back.

ENTRY.NAME: One Last Hand
ENTRY.COMMENT: through early while dropping far back

ENTRY.NAME: Out Work'n
ENTRY.COMMENT: lunged from the gate, raced along evenly while no menace

ENTRY.NAME: Lofty Adjudicator
ENTRY.COMMENT: well handled on the front end between horses, cleared off late

ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed winner to the stretch, could not get past, bested rest

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 61. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since April 5, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $6,250 (Ohio Registe red Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MY ANGELICA tracked leaders to the stretch, ranged up, roused to go clear. KNOT WILD inside trip to the turn in no hurry, angled out, finished well. SUPORB rushed between horses early on, short lead into stretch, showed. AIN'T SHE A PISTOL inside chase to the stretch, could not go on in the late going. COMPETITIVE FIRE failed to menace throughout. TENAKEE brief speed from inside, collard into turn and gave way readily.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 6 5F Dirt CR: 66. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES IN 2022 - 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE NOVEMBER 5. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 5 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).

CLAIM.OWNER: Esquivel Maria and Esquivel Jose Jesus

RACE.FOOTNOTES: EL PEJE inside speed early on, shuffled back, angled out roused ran clear. STUNNING BABY broke sharp settled back inside to turn, rallied along late going. FEELING IT between horses to the lead, dueled into stretch, weakened late. NO BANG NO BOOM (IRE) raced along evenly, ducked inside stretch run no gain. LOCK ON never a factor. CHIEF HOWCOME good speed, pressed leader to the turn, gave way readily stretch.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 64. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16500. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $20,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ROCK THE NILE pressed leader to the turn, took over under good handling to go clear. WEST COASTER between horses early on, shuffled back, rallied back, even terms. QUALITY outside run to the turn, rallied along in the stretch, even terms. LOST BIKINI brief inside speed to the turn, gave in readily from quarter pole. SLENDER BETSY through early, dropped back. GAMBI had an awkward trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Lost Bikini
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief inside speed to the turn, gave in readily from quarter pole

ENTRY.NAME: Gambi
ENTRY.COMMENT: had an awkward start and always trailed

ENTRY.NAME: Slender Betsy
ENTRY.COMMENT: through early, dropped back

ENTRY.NAME: dh-West Coaster
ENTRY.COMMENT: between horses early on, shuffled back, rallied back, even terms

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Daryl E. Parker Memorial Tall Stack S. BELTERRA PARK RACE 8 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 80. Stakes Purse 75000. FOR THREE YEARS OLD, REGISTERED OHIO FOALS. By subscription of $50 each, which shall accompany the nomination. $263 due at time of entry and $487 additional to start, which shall be due at noon, day of the race. $75,000 Guaranteed (Includes $26,259 OTF), of which 60% to the winner; 20% to second; 10% to third; 5% to fourth; 3% to fifth; 2% to sixth. Weight 122 lbs. Non-Winners of a Sweepstakes 2 lbs; non-Winners of two races other than 4 lbs.; a race other than 6 lbs. (non-Winners other than maiden, cla iming or starter Not Considered in Allowances.) Starters to be named through the entry box by the usual time of closing. This race will be limited to fourteen (14) horses with preference to start given to those who have accumulated the highest career earn ings in 2022-2023. Failure to draw in cancels all fees. Trophy presented to the winning owner. Nominations closed Tuesday, April 25, 2023 with 23 nominations.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TROJAN TALE showed good speed to duel to quarter pole, dug in gamely in the stretch run to prevail. PAINT THE TOWN a bit tardy early on, lagged back to the turn, angled out ran on through the stretch with a late surge but missed in a good effort. FAIR AND SQUARE lunged from the gate, rushed up to contend, made a bid in the stretch but weakened in the final furlong. NEED TO KNOW BASIS raced along evenly with no late kick when needed in the stretch run. MR. BALI in no hurry early on, trailed to the stretch and only passed a couple in the late going. WETZEL saved ground throughout with nothing left in the stretch run. MEDIA DARLING flashed inside speed, dueled to the turn with nothing left and faded back.

ENTRY.NAME: Mr. Bali
ENTRY.COMMENT: no hurry early trailed to the stretch, passed a couple late going

ENTRY.NAME: Media Darling
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed, dueled to the turn, nothing left and faded back

ENTRY.NAME: Fair and Square
ENTRY.OWNER: WinStar Farm LLC and Blazing Meadows Farm LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: lunged from the gate, rushed up to contend bid stretch, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Trojan Tale
ENTRY.COMMENT: good speed to duel to quarter pole, dug in gamely to prevail

ENTRY.NAME: Paint the Town
ENTRY.COMMENT: bit tardy early on, lagged back to turn, angled out late surge

ENTRY.NAME: Wetzel
ENTRY.OWNER: Pickerrell William D Pickerrell Joe and Cline Robert C
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground throughout with nothing left in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Need to Know Basis
ENTRY.OWNER: WinStar Farm LLC and Blazing Meadows Farm LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly with no late kick when needed
